no.uio.duo

Class WorkflowManagerWrapper

  • java.lang.Object
    • no.uio.duo.WorkflowManagerWrapper

  • public class WorkflowManagerWrapper
extends java.lang.Object
    Wraper class providing an abstraction over the DSpace workflow manager. DSpace has two workflow managers, depending on whether the configurable workflow is in use or not, and they have different API calls. This class provides a single API which maps to the appropriate call to the correct workflow manager, in contexts which are relevant to the Duo application
